name: My Own Mine
description:
In this game you have a mine and you need to get iron from the mine to sell it.

                        Feature

Saving System with different slots

Inventory System (with crafting)

Your own shop

One Pickaxe (Stone Pickaxe)

                      Controls

Left Mouse Button - Attack

W - Move Forward

S - Move Backward

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Space bar - Jump

E - Pick up Item/Sell to a customer

Q - Drop Items

Tab - Open Inventory

Escape - Open Menu

                         Note

Right now you can't do too many things in the game, but in the next updates i will add a lot of feature
